sn12.32:4.2: Atha kho kaḷārakhattiyo bhikkhu yenāyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkami;
sn12.32:4.4: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
sn12.32:4.5: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho kaḷārakhattiyo bhikkhu āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ etadavoca:
sn12.32:4.6: “moḷiyaphagguno, āvuso sāriputta, bhikkhu sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvatto”ti.
sn12.32:4.7: “Na hi nūna so āyasmā imasmiṃ dhammavinaye assāsamalatthā”ti.
sn12.32:5.1: “Tena hāyasmā sāriputto imasmiṃ dhammavinaye assāsaṃ patto”ti?
sn12.32:8.1: Atha kho kaḷārakhattiyo bhikkhu uṭṭhāyāsanā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn12.32:8.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho kaḷārakhattiyo bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn12.32:8.5: ‘khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā’ti pajānāmī”ti.
sn12.32:9.1: Atha kho bhagavā aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ āmantesi:
sn12.32:9.2: “ehi tvaṃ, bhikkhu, mama vacanena sāriputtaṃ āmantehi:
sn12.32:9.4: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato paṭissutvā yenāyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkami;
sn12.32:9.7: “Evaṃ, āvuso”ti kho āyasmā sāriputto tassa bhikkhuno paṭissutvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn12.32:9.9: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ bhagavā etadavoca:
sn12.32:9.11: ‘khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā’ti pajānāmī”ti?
sn12.32:9.12: “Na kho, bhante, etehi padehi etehi byañjanehi attho vutto”ti.
sn12.32:9.13: “Yena kenacipi, sāriputta, pariyāyena kulaputto aññaṃ byākaroti, atha kho byākataṃ byākatato daṭṭhabban”ti.
sn12.32:9.15: ‘na kho, bhante, etehi padehi etehi byañjanehi attho vutto’”ti.
sn12.32:10.2: ‘kathaṃ jānatā pana tayā, āvuso sāriputta, kathaṃ passatā aññā byākatā—
sn12.32:10.3: khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyāti pajānāmī’ti.
sn12.32:10.4: Evaṃ puṭṭho tvaṃ, sāriputta, kinti byākareyyāsī”ti?
sn12.32:11.2: ‘kathaṃ jānatā pana tayā, āvuso sāriputta, kathaṃ passatā aññā byākatā—
sn12.32:11.3: khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyāti pajānāmī’ti;
sn12.32:11.4: evaṃ puṭṭhohaṃ, bhante, evaṃ byākareyyaṃ:
sn12.32:11.5: ‘yaṃnidānā, āvuso, jāti, tassa nidānassa khayā khīṇasmiṃ khīṇāmhīti viditaṃ.
sn12.32:11.7: khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyāti pajānāmī’ti.
sn12.32:12.2: ‘jāti panāvuso sāriputta, kiṃnidānā kiṃsamudayā kiṃjātikā kiṃpabhavā’ti?
sn12.32:12.3: Evaṃ puṭṭho taṃ, sāriputta, kinti byākareyyāsī”ti?
sn12.32:12.5: ‘jāti panāvuso sāriputta, kiṃnidānā kiṃsamudayā kiṃjātikā kiṃpabhavā’ti?
sn12.32:12.7: ‘jāti kho, āvuso, bhavanidānā bhavasamudayā bhavajātikā bhavappabhavā’ti.
sn12.32:13.2: ‘bhavo panāvuso sāriputta, kiṃnidāno kiṃsamudayo kiṃjātiko kiṃpabhavo’ti?
sn12.32:13.3: Evaṃ puṭṭho tvaṃ, sāriputta, kinti byākareyyāsī”ti?
sn12.32:13.5: ‘bhavo panāvuso sāriputta, kiṃnidāno kiṃsamudayo kiṃjātiko kiṃpabhavo’ti?
sn12.32:13.7: ‘bhavo kho, āvuso, upādānanidāno upādānasamudayo upādānajātiko upādānappabhavo’ti.
sn12.32:14.3: sace pana taṃ, sāriputta, evaṃ puccheyyuṃ—
sn12.32:14.4: taṇhā panāvuso sāriputta, kiṃnidānā kiṃsamudayā kiṃjātikā kiṃpabhavā’ti?
sn12.32:14.5: Evaṃ puṭṭho tvaṃ, sāriputta, kinti byākareyyāsī”ti?
sn12.32:14.7: ‘taṇhā panāvuso sāriputta, kiṃnidānā kiṃsamudayā kiṃjātikā kiṃpabhavā’ti?
sn12.32:14.9: ‘taṇhā kho, āvuso, vedanānidānā vedanāsamudayā vedanājātikā vedanāpabhavā’ti.
sn12.32:15.2: ‘kathaṃ jānato pana te, āvuso sāriputta, kathaṃ passato yā vedanāsu nandī sā na upaṭṭhāsī’ti.
sn12.32:15.3: Evaṃ puṭṭho tvaṃ, sāriputta, kinti byākareyyāsī”ti?
sn12.32:15.5: ‘kathaṃ jānato pana te, āvuso sāriputta, kathaṃ passato yā vedanāsu nandī sā na upaṭṭhāsī’ti evaṃ puṭṭhohaṃ, bhante, evaṃ byākareyyaṃ:
sn12.32:15.8: Sukhā vedanā, dukkhā vedanā, adukkhamasukhā vedanā.
sn12.32:15.9: Imā kho, āvuso, tisso vedanā aniccā.
sn12.32:15.10: Yadaniccaṃ taṃ dukkhanti viditaṃ, yā vedanāsu nandī sā na upaṭṭhāsī’ti.
sn12.32:16.2: Ayampi kho, sāriputta, pariyāyo, etasseva atthassa saṅkhittena veyyākaraṇāya:
sn12.32:17.2: ‘kathaṃ vimokkhā pana tayā, āvuso sāriputta, aññā byākatā—
sn12.32:17.3: khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyāti pajānāmī’ti?
sn12.32:17.4: Evaṃ puṭṭho tvaṃ, sāriputta, kinti byākareyyāsī”ti?
sn12.32:17.6: ‘kathaṃ vimokkhā pana tayā, āvuso sāriputta, aññā byākatā—
sn12.32:17.7: khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyāti pajānāmī’ti.
sn12.32:17.9: ‘ajjhattaṃ vimokkhā khvāhaṃ, āvuso, sabbupādānakkhayā tathā sato viharāmi yathā sataṃ viharantaṃ āsavā nānussavanti, attānañca nāvajānāmī’ti.
sn12.32:18.2: Ayampi kho sāriputta, pariyāyo etasseva atthassa saṅkhittena veyyākaraṇāya—
sn12.32:18.3: ye āsavā samaṇena vuttā tesvāhaṃ na kaṅkhāmi, te me pahīnāti na vicikicchāmī”ti.
sn12.32:18.5: Idaṃ vatvā sugato uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ pāvisi.
sn12.32:19.1: Tatra kho āyasmā sāriputto acirapakkantassa bhagavato bhikkhū āmantesi:
sn12.32:19.2: “pubbe appaṭisaṃviditaṃ maṃ, āvuso, bhagavā paṭhamaṃ pañhaṃ apucchi, tassa me ahosi dandhāyitattaṃ.
sn12.32:19.3: Yato ca kho me, āvuso, bhagavā paṭhamaṃ pañhaṃ anumodi, tassa mayhaṃ, āvuso, etadahosi—
sn12.32:19.4: divasañcepi maṃ bhagavā etamatthaṃ puccheyya aññamaññehi padehi aññamaññehi pariyāyehi, divasampāhaṃ bhagavato etamatthaṃ byākareyyaṃ aññamaññehi padehi aññamaññehi pariyāyehi.
sn12.32:19.5: Rattiñcepi maṃ bhagavā etamatthaṃ puccheyya aññamaññehi padehi aññamaññehi pariyāyehi, rattimpāhaṃ bhagavato etamatthaṃ byākareyyaṃ aññamaññehi padehi aññamaññehi pariyāyehi.
sn12.32:19.6: Rattindivaṃ cepi maṃ bhagavā etamatthaṃ puccheyya aññamaññehi padehi aññamaññehi pariyāyehi, rattindivampāhaṃ bhagavato etamatthaṃ byākareyyaṃ aññamaññehi padehi aññamaññehi pariyāyehi.
sn12.32:19.7: Dve rattindivāni cepi maṃ bhagavā etamatthaṃ puccheyya … pe …
sn12.32:19.8: dve rattindivānipāhaṃ bhagavato etamatthaṃ byākareyyaṃ … pe …
sn12.32:19.9: tīṇi rattindivāni cepi maṃ bhagavā etamatthaṃ puccheyya … pe …
sn12.32:19.10: tīṇi rattindivānipāhaṃ bhagavato etamatthaṃ byākareyyaṃ … pe …
sn12.32:19.11: cattāri rattindivāni cepi maṃ bhagavā etamatthaṃ puccheyya … pe …
sn12.32:19.12: cattāri rattindivānipāhaṃ bhagavato etamatthaṃ byākareyyaṃ … pe …
sn12.32:19.13: pañca rattindivāni cepi maṃ bhagavā etamatthaṃ puccheyya … pe …
sn12.32:19.14: pañca rattindivānipāhaṃ bhagavato etamatthaṃ byākareyyaṃ … pe …
sn12.32:19.15: cha rattindivāni cepi maṃ bhagavā etamatthaṃ puccheyya … pe …
sn12.32:19.16: cha rattindivānipāhaṃ bhagavato etamatthaṃ byākareyyaṃ … pe …
sn12.32:19.17: satta rattindivāni cepi maṃ bhagavā etamatthaṃ puccheyya aññamaññehi padehi aññamaññehi pariyāyehi, satta rattindivānipāhaṃ bhagavato etamatthaṃ byākareyyaṃ aññamaññehi padehi aññamaññehi pariyāyehī”ti.
sn12.32:20.1: Atha kho kaḷārakhattiyo bhikkhu uṭṭhāyāsanā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn12.32:20.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho kaḷārakhattiyo bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn12.32:20.5: pubbe appaṭisaṃviditaṃ maṃ, āvuso, bhagavā paṭhamaṃ pañhaṃ apucchi, tassa me ahosi dandhāyitattaṃ.
sn12.32:20.6: Yato ca kho me, āvuso, bhagavā paṭhamaṃ pañhaṃ anumodi, tassa mayhaṃ, āvuso, etadahosi—

sn12.32:20.10: dve rattindivāni cepi maṃ bhagavā … pe …
sn12.32:20.15: satta rattindivāni cepi maṃ bhagavā etamatthaṃ puccheyya aññamaññehi padehi aññamaññehi pariyāyehi, satta rattindivānipāhaṃ bhagavato etamatthaṃ byākareyyaṃ aññamaññehi padehi aññamaññehi pariyāyehī”ti.
sn12.32:21.1: “Sā hi, bhikkhu, sāriputtassa dhammadhātu suppaṭividdhā, yassā dhammadhātuyā suppaṭividdhattā divasaṃ cepāhaṃ sāriputtaṃ etamatthaṃ puccheyyaṃ aññamaññehi padehi aññamaññehi pariyāyehi, divasampi me sāriputto etamatthaṃ byākareyya aññamaññehi padehi aññamaññehi pariyāyehi.
sn12.32:21.2: Rattiṃ cepāhaṃ sāriputtaṃ etamatthaṃ puccheyyaṃ aññamaññehi padehi aññamaññehi pariyāyehi, rattimpi me sāriputto etamatthaṃ byākareyya … pe …
sn12.32:21.3: rattindivaṃ cepāhaṃ sāriputtaṃ etamatthaṃ puccheyyaṃ, rattindivampi me sāriputto etamatthaṃ byākareyya …
sn12.32:21.4: dve rattindivāni cepāhaṃ sāriputtaṃ etamatthaṃ puccheyyaṃ, dve rattindivānipi me sāriputto etamatthaṃ byākareyya …
sn12.32:21.5: tīṇi rattindivāni cepāhaṃ sāriputtaṃ etamatthaṃ puccheyyaṃ, tīṇi rattindivānipi me sāriputto etamatthaṃ byākareyya …
sn12.32:21.6: cattāri rattindivāni cepāhaṃ sāriputtaṃ etamatthaṃ puccheyyaṃ, cattāri rattindivānipi me sāriputto etamatthaṃ byākareyya …
sn12.32:21.7: pañca rattindivāni cepāhaṃ sāriputtaṃ etamatthaṃ puccheyyaṃ, pañca rattindivānipi me sāriputto etamatthaṃ byākareyya …
sn12.32:21.8: cha rattindivāni cepāhaṃ sāriputtaṃ etamatthaṃ puccheyyaṃ, cha rattindivānipi me sāriputto etamatthaṃ byākareyya …
sn12.32:21.9: satta rattindivāni cepāhaṃ sāriputtaṃ etamatthaṃ puccheyyaṃ aññamaññehi padehi aññamaññehi pariyāyehi, satta rattindivānipi me sāriputto etamatthaṃ byākareyya aññamaññehi padehi aññamaññehi pariyāyehī”ti.
